Posts.Content: Hi, try not to fixate on the size, very hard  i know I've had  breast cancer twice now so the waiting time is so very hard.   My first lump also seemed larger in my view when i felt it, i kept touching it worrying. Its natural to feel like this, get the results and take things from there but i wish you the very very best for a positive outcome  xx
Posts.Title: Curious.....

Posts.Title: Curious.....

Posts.Content: Yes big boobies aren't always a blessing    I had a bilateral mastectomy last year and was a size E. They've got it now so be strong ive survived twice so there are positives ok!
Posts.Title: Curious.....

Posts.Content: Of course i dont mind you asking, after all thats why we on one here to share experiences It was 7 years between the two diagnoses and yes same side but not recurring it was a secondary. So tyey were great and did full bidy ct and bone scan that after a concern did in the end come back ok. Very lucky but there are more of us now that get through this
